mapper.select: select aa.r as date, ifnull(bb.cnt1, 0) as sum, ifnull(bb.cnt2, 0) as tal from (with recursive c as (select 1 as r union all select r + 1 from c where r < 12) select r from c) as aa left join (select month(o_date) as mon, count(case when o_approval = 1 then 1 end) as cnt1, count(case when o_approval = 4 then 1 end) as cnt2 from owner where o_approval in (1, 4) and year(o_date) = #{dal} group by mon order by mon) as bb on aa.r = bb.mon;

select aa.r as date, ifnull(bb.cnt1,0) as sum, ifnull(bb.cnt2,0) as tal from(with recursive c as (select 2019 as r union all select r+1 from c where r < #{nowYear}) select r from c) as aa left join (select year(o_date) as year,count(case when o_approval = 1 then 1 end) as cnt1, count(case when o_approval =4 then 1 end) as cnt2 from owner where o_approval in(1,4) group by year order by year) as bb on aa.r = bb.year
